thread.title: Weekend in Paris -
thread.title_full: Weekend in Paris - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Linda V
title: Weekend in Paris -
text:
We stayed at the hotel Melia for two nights. The hotel is situated right next to the metro in the financial district. The hotel itself is very comfortable and well run. There is a rooftop bar, which has amazing views of the city.
Our room was very spacious and the beds very comfortable. Staff were very friendly and professional.
Very pleased with our stay.
Room Tip: Premium rooms over look the city, costs a bit more, but the view is stunning See more room tips
